column5: But a couple bags of these at Orangeville's Everything For a Dollar Store. Green with chartusse tail. Anyone have luck with these?

They're a good bait if you're lookin' for BIG Largies, I like them fished weightless and weedless in the salad!!! You won't get very many dinks, but when you get a bite set the hook HARD and HANG ON!!!
They come with 2 or 3 good 5/0 hooks so for $1 the lizards were just a bonus for me.
